Verses: 1 naan Alangaththaik Kattimudiththadhaiyum, Ini Adhile Thirappu Ondrumillai Enbadhaiyum, Sanpallaaththum, Thobiyaavum, Arabiyanaana Keshemum Engalukkundaayirundha Matrap Pagaignarum Kelvippattapodhu,

2 naan Vaasalgalukku Innum Kadhavupodaadhirukkaiyil, Sanpallaaththum, Keshemum Aal Anuppi: Naam Ono Pallaththaakkil Irukkira Graamangal Ondril Oruvaraiyoruvar Kandu Pesuvom Vaarum Endru Kooppittaargal; Avargalovendraal, Enakkup Pollaappu Seyya Ninaiththaargal.

3 appozhudhu Naan Avargalidaththirku Aatkalai Anuppi: Naan Periya Velaiyai Seygiren, Naan Varak Koodaadhu, Naan Andha Velaiyaivittu Ungalidaththirku Varugiradhinaal Adhu Minakkattuppovaanen Endru Sollachchonnen.
4 avargal Indhappragaaramaaga Naaludharam Enakku Solliyanuppinaargal; Naanum Indhappragaaramaagave Avargalukku Marumozhi Anuppinen.
5 aindhaandharamum Sanpallaaththu Andhap Pragaaramaagave Than Velaikkaaranaiyum, Avan Kaiyile Muththiraipodaadha Oru Kadidhaththaiyum Enakku Anuppinaan.
6 adhile: Neerum Yoodharum Kalagampanna Ninaikkireergal Endrum, Adharkaaga Neer Alangaththaik Kattugireer Endrum, Ivvidhamaaga Neer Avargalukku Raajaavaagap Pogireer Endrum,

7 yoodhaavile Oru Raajaa Irukkiraar Endru Ummaikkuriththu Erusalemile Koorugira Theerkkadharisigalaiyum Sambaadhiththeerendrum Purajaadhigalukkulle Prasthaabamaayirukkiradhu, Kashmoovum Appadi Sollugiraan; Ippodhum Andha Seydhi Raajaavukku Ettume; Aagaiyaal Naam Oruvarodoruvar Aalosanaipannugiradharkaaga Neer Varavendum Endru Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
8 adharku Naan: Neer Sollugira Andhak Kaariyangalil Ondrum Nadakkavillai; Avaigal Ummudaiya Manoraajyame Ozhiya Veralla Endru Solliyanuppinen.
9 andha Velai Nadandheraadhapadikku Engal Kai Saliththuppom Endru Solli, Avargal Ellaarum Engalai Bayamuruththappaarththaargal. Aadhalaal Dhevane Neer En Kaigalaith Thidappaduththiyarulum,

10 megadhaabeyelin Kumaaranaagiya Thelaayaavin Magan Semaayaa Than Veettile Adaikkappattirukkumpodhu, Naan Avanidaththil Ponen; Appozhudhu Avan Naam Iruvarumaai Dhevanudaiya Veedaagiya Aalayaththukkulle Poi Dhevaalayaththin Kadhavugalaip Poottuvom Vaarum; Ummaik Kondrupoda Varuvaargal, Iravile Ummaik Kondrupoda Varuvaargal Endraan.
11 adharku Naan: Ennaippondra Manidhan Odippovaano? Ennaippondravan Uyirpizhaikkumpadi Dhevaalayaththile Poip Padhunguvaano? Naan Povadhillai Endren.
12 dhevan Avanai Anuppavillaiyendrum, Thobiyaavum Sanpallaaththum Avanukkuk Koolikoduththadhinaal, Avan Enakku Virodhamaai Andhath Theerkkadharisanaththai Sonnaan Endrum Arindhukonden.
13 naan Bayandhu Appadi Seydhu Paavankattikkollugiradharkum, Ennai Nindhikkaththakka Abakeerththikku Mugaandharam Undaakkugiradharkum Avanukkuk Kaikkooli Koduththirundhaargal.

14 en Dhevane, Thobiyaavum Sanpallaaththum Seydha Indha Seygaigalukkuththakkadhaaga Neer Avargalaiyum, Novadhiyaal Ennum Theerkkadharisiyaanavalaiyum, Enakku Bayamundaakkappaarththa Matrath Theerkkadharisigalaiyum Ninaiththukkollum.
15 appadiye Alangamaanadhu Aimbaththirandu Naalaikkulle Kattappattu, Elool Maadham Irubaththaindhaanthedhiyile Mudindhadhu.

16 engal Pagaignar Ellaarum Adhaik Kettapodhum, Engal Sutruppuraththaaraagiya Purajaadhiyaana Anaivarum Kandapodhum, Migavum Munaiyatruppoi, Indhak Kiriyai Engal Dhevanaal Kaikoodi Vandhadhendru Arindhaargal.
17 andha Naatkalil Yoodhaavilulla Periya Manidharidaththilirundhu Thobiyaavukkup Pogiradhum, Thobiyaavinidaththilirundhu Avargalukku Varugiradhumaana Kadidhangal Anegamaayirundhadhu.

18 avan Aaraagin Kumaaranaagiya Seganiyaavukku Marumaganaayirundhadhumallaamal, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaan Peragiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Mesullaamin Kumaaraththiyai Vivaagampanniyirundhapadiyaalum, Yoodhaavil Anegar Avanukku Aanaiyittuk Koduththirundhaargal.
19 avan Seyyum Nanmaigalaiyum Avargal Enakku Munbaaga Vivariththu, En Vaarththaigalai Avanukkuk Kondupovaargal; Thobiyaa Enakku Bayamundaagak Kadidhangalai Anuppuvaan.
